page.title: 16** Horse Riding.************
page.content:
My Mummy has a riding school the ponies are all mares. Misty and Shamara belong to me, but Rhona belongs to Cathy and Richard my friends. We know that Misty is 12 hands and I can take the saddle off and the bridle off too.
One day I went to a rally and did all sort of things and I fell off. Then we went down to the log and I jumped it. Then we cantered to our Mummies but Misty galloped to Mummy. Then it was time to go home.
Then we got to the field. I galloped to the gate where Shamara was waiting for her Mummy. I jumped off Misty and took off her bridle and saddle and let her into the field to have something to eat and me and Mummy went home for tea feeling very tired.
